item.title: Entity Matching Theory
item.description: This blog post discusses the reasoning process I went through while addressing a particular problem in entity matching. Although libraries exist to address this task, my focus here is on the conceptual questions that arise during problem solving.

item.title: Entity Matching: Solving the Problem of Duplicate Entities in Knowledge Graphs
item.description: In this blog, I’ll walk through **what entity matching is**, why it matters in knowledge graphs, and how I designed an efficient solution—available on my [GitHub repo](https://github.com/awepo-pro/entity_matching).
